website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Trilux Run is a lightweight running shoe with a stylish design. Many runners admired the shoe, but others could not help but mention a few criticisms. Though there are a few who are unsatisfied, the shoe is still well-received by others, and they would still recommend the shoe for those who are looking for a lightweight, comfortable, and affordable road running shoe.
pros: A couple of runners found the Reebok Trilux Run to be a lightweight road running shoe
A lot of wearers gave positive remarks on the shoe’s stylish design and impressive colors
some said they get compliments every time they wear the shoe
Several users highlighted that the shoe is very comfortable
Some reviewers were happy with the shoe’s overall fit
some said the Reebok Trilux Run is best for wide-footed runners
The shoe is affordable, said a few purchasers
Some people used the Trilux Run for gym workouts, and they said that it worked well
cons: One disappointed user mentioned that the sole is not durable, it came loose after a few miles
The mesh upper is too thin that the toes could already be seen, according to a wearer

customer_reviews.title: **UPDATE** on the update...These shoes are great!
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE ON THE UPDATE** My inserts finally squeaked with other shoes, so it's the inserts I bought from another company that actually squeak-Not the shoes. The shoes are great! After several months, the shoes started squeaking! No, it's not my inserts, I put those in other shoes that do not squeak. I sound like I have 2 ducks following me around! *Quack* *Quack* *UPDATE* They squeak when my INSERTS are used with them. The inserts do not squeak with other shoes. I sound like a duck walking around, but the shoes are comfortable. So, in conclusion, the shoes do not squeak (I don't think). I only use secondary inserts in them, so...
customer_reviews.author: RetailMinimalist

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fashionable walking/shopping and these are super cute! They are really comfortable! I like the different color and fabric patterns. I wear a size 10 and ordered a 10, they fit perfect. They are lightweight and sleek so you don’t feel like you’re stomping around. I really like how they look with leggings and wearing them to the gym. I don’t work out in them I just wear them out and about. Overall - I’m interested to know how well they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: happyrunner

customer_reviews.title: Cute with Skinny Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I wanted new shoes to wear with skinny jeans and leggings. The athletic shoes I had were too bulky. These look sleek and cute. I just wear them for walking around and they are comfortable. I don't plan to wear them to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: LK1982

customer_reviews.title: No support but very cute
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit perfect and it is very cute. However, there is no support, so if that’s what you’re looking for then it is not the right shoe for you. I use it mostly for walking around
customer_reviews.author: regan

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very well made and comfortable. They are lightweight and breathable just like I wanted them to be. They arrived very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mammabear

customer_reviews.title: Weird high inflexible back to the shoe
customer_reviews.text: The show looks fine, nice even and it provides a nice amount of support. However, the back is too high and it rubs the back of my Achilles. I put an insert in the shoe and it works just fine to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Willa See

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet all day and these sneakers are great.
customer_reviews.author: megaloo819

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, comfortable, true to size, great fit. I’ve worn them a week and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McG

customer_reviews.title: Can’t run in these
customer_reviews.text: I need to return these ASAP, cute shoes but not comfortable for running. These are not truly a runners shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Fit perfect and comfortable. Thank you so much. I highly recommended this project
customer_reviews.author: Girlie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: I love Reebok
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and true to size. I purchased these on sale and it was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but color is not even close
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is beautiful but the color is nothing like the picture. It’s a very deep, deep plum and a dark gray purple and very light gray lilac color. But still very pretty. But definitely way closer to gray than lilac.
customer_reviews.author: Lesly P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit but really cute
customer_reviews.text: I would not get this brand again, gave my feet blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: On my feet all day. Shoes are lightweight and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nani4

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. It was delivered a day before the estimated date.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy de la Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but a little stiff on the first few wears
customer_reviews.text: Little stiff when you first put them on but after a few wears they loosen up. I’ve had this style before & I love them! They are light weight & breathable.
customer_reviews.author: ghost33

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight shoe. Not too narrow. Just right. I wear them to work at a busy hospital, on my feet for 12 hours. I love them. No more aching feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: As shown on the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love them they fit perfectly, nothing to worry about them!
customer_reviews.author: Samymoreno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cleab
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy white fabric shoes, but a tide pen cleans these off perfectly! Very attractive and comfortable. Great as trainers.
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is mu second time ordering this shoe and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: I receive lost of compliment on them
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hard I stand all day at work
customer_reviews.author: ANA A MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to exercise in. I have a wide toe/ball of foot area so I struggle to find comfortable shoes. These are great because they have flexible space in them to fit narrow or a bit wide. I love them. They are great for my needs. BUT as a previous marathon runner (bad knees now, running days are long gone) I wouldn’t call these running shoes for the long distance, outdoor runner maybe for a 30 min. run on the treadmill but not for long runs out on the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Fits big
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe. They do fit a little big, and wide. I would recommend buying a half size down from what your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: The Works

customer_reviews.title: Rebook 5.5
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect. Great for running love them so much I will be purchasing the pink and gray!!! Love then!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Maradona
